alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Ashe; Watauga (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 17 at 2:15PM EST until December 19 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EST MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM MONDAY TO 3 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Ashe, Alleghany NC and Watauga Counties. In Virginia, Grayson, Carroll, Floyd and Roanoke Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 3 PM EST Tuesday. For the High Wind Warning, from 1 AM to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur early Monday morning through Monday evening.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive.
